mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, FROM_MEMBER_NO, TO_MEMBER_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_DATE, MESSAGE_CONFIRM) VALUES ('ALE' || LPAD(SEQ_MESSAGE_NO.NEXTVAL,5,0) , #{fromMemberNo}, #{toMemberNo}, #{messageContent} ,SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE TO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MESSAGE_CONFIRM = 'N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC

SELECT MESSAGE_NO, FROM_MEMBER_NO, FROM_MEMBER_NICKNAME, FROM_MEMBER_PHOTO , TO_MEMBER_NO, TO_MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_MEMBER_PHOTO , MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_DATE, MESSAGE_CONFIRM FROM VIEW_MESSAGE WHERE TO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MESSAGE_CONFIRM = 'N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM VIEW_MESSAGE WHERE (TO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} OR FROM_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AND TO_MEMBER_NO NOT IN (SELECT FROM_MEMBER_NO FROM VIEW_MESSAGE WHERE TO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AND ROWID IN (SELECT MIN(ROWID) FROM VIEW_MESSAGE GROUP BY FROM_MEMBER_NO, TO_MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM VIEW_MESSAGE WHERE (TO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} OR FROM_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AND ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM VIEW_MESSAGE GROUP BY FROM_MEMBER_NO, TO_MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM VIEW_MESSAGE WHERE (FROM_MEMBER_NO = #{fromMemberNo} AND TO_MEMBER_NO = #{toMemberNo}) OR (FROM_MEMBER_NO = #{toMemberNo} AND TO_MEMBER_NO = #{fromMemberNo}) ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE
